name: Spin Poker
description:
Feel the excitement of a true casino environment with Spin Poker, where Video Poker and Slots get combined so you can play up to 9-lines at once for ultimate payouts. Included is 3 game variations that all poker pros play; Jacks Or Better, Double Double Bonus and Triple Double Bonus. This is an incredibly fun game for Video Poker players.

Based on the casino version with the same odds and payouts, Spin Poker has a unique twist on the conventional Video Poker machines. Your goal is to make the best poker hand with the 9 available pay lines. Play 1 line all the way up to 9 lines at once with denominations starting from 1¢ penny through $1 dollar per line with the max bet being 5 credits per line.

While maintaining the familiarity with the casino game, our iteration has several extras; Ambient background music imitating casino noises, the deck of cards features cool characters on the faces, a flashing stats tracker to keep you up on your level of play, plus…a Horror Mode with ghost projections, tiny black bats and hair raising sounds.

Spin Poker is a pay once application. For only $1.99 you get the full game and all updates that come down the pike for free. There are no bothersome ads or crazy endless in-app purchases.
